quote: I think games are starting to branch out. It won't be, 'This is a traditional game and this is a social game,' it will be everything in between.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
attrib: Steve Jobs, Co-founder of Apple Inc.

quote: Video games foster the mindset that allows creativity to grow.

attrib: Sebastian 'Ceb' Debs, Dota 2 Player and Coach

quote: Press 'A' to believe.

attrib: Hideo Kojima, Creator of Metal Gear Solid

quote: The best games are the ones we can share with others.

quote: I chose to be the person I wanted to be.

quote: I used to be an adventurer like you, then I took an arrow to the knee.
attrib: Guard, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

quote: All your base are belong to us.

Information wants to be free.
The future will be confusing.
The future is a vast, rotting corpse, an infinite being with a trillion-cubed tons of cold meat.
The streets are full of admirable craftsmen, but so few practical dreamers.
We live in a society that has no use for us. We're not needed. We're useless. We're human garbage.
attrib: Philip K. Dick, 'Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?'

quote: Time has fallen asleep in the afternoon sunshine.
It's not who you are that holds you back; it's who you think you're not.
Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.
There is no real ending. It's just the place where you stop the story.

In a world where you can be anything, be kind.
The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
What is the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable?
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
The man who has no imagination has no wings.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
